job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtjob responsibilitiesltpgtltpgtthe engineers responsibilities include understanding requirements and technical specifications of complex enterprise solutions creation of customerlike lab environments the design and execution of tests use andor development of specialized tools to facilitate testing working with architects softwarehardware engineers to investigate problem areas and effective communication of problem areas solution capabilities and potential customer impacting issuesltpgtltpgtlinaltpgtltpgtjob requirementltpgtltpgtrequired skills sets software hardware languages os tools etcltpgtltpgtbs or ms in computer science or a related engineering field years experience in systemsolution test or system engineering in a communications related field a strong desire to learn and develop expertise in business communications and test business communications systems end to end at scale and in disaster recovery scenarios is essentialltpgtltpgtdesired skill setsltpgtltpgtsolution testing in one or more of the following areas avaya contact centers cloudbased solutions webrtc servers networks lanwan clientserver architectures operating systems web services unified communications effective communication skills oral and written and the ability to function in a team environment experience with windows os and domain infrastructures linux databases mssql oracle db informix virtualization web services and pbxs with acd capabilitiesltpgtltpgtexperienceltpgtltpgt years of experienceltpgtltpgteducationltpgtltpgtbachelor degree or equivalent experienceltpgtltpgtadvance degree preferredltpgt
